entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
